servinfo.title: Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Inspection of Immobilizer Control Module (ICM) and Its Circuit:Petrol Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Disable air bag system referring to Disabling Air Bag System .
Remove driver air bag (inflator) module referring to Driver Air Bag (Inflator) Module Removal and Installation .
Remove steering wheel referring to Steering Wheel Removal and Installation:Petrol Engine Model .
Remove steering column lower and upper covers.
Remove engine start knob (1). (If equipped with keyless start system)
Remove ICM from steering lock assembly or steering lock unit.

attention3.ptxt: The antenna part of ICM is fragile. Therefore, do not add strong power to the part or twist the part.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure nothing the following.
Enabling Air bag system referring to Enabling Air Bag System .
